about_the_game:
Better Mart – Build and Manage Your Dream Supermarket!

Welcome to Better Mart, a dynamic management game where you create, customize, and grow the ultimate supermarket! Combining fun and strategy, this game gives you complete freedom to design a unique store, attract customers, and maximize your profits.

A Complete and Addictive Management Experience

In Better Mart, you have full control over every aspect of your supermarket. Choose the layout of your aisles, arrange products efficiently, and optimize customer flow to ensure a smooth and enjoyable shopping experience. Keep your shelves stocked, monitor market trends, and adjust your prices to outsmart the competition.

What Awaits You in Better Mart:

🔹 Build and customize your supermarket – Design the aisles, set up different areas, and create a welcoming environment for your customers.

🔹 Manage supply and inventory – Keep track of stock levels, order new products, and adjust prices based on market trends.

🔹 Grow your business – Hire and train staff, improve checkout efficiency, and invest in modern equipment.

🔹 Unlock new sections – Add a bakery, fresh produce section, electronics department, and much more to expand your offerings.

🔹 Enhance customer experience – Study customer behavior, optimize their shopping journey, and ensure their satisfaction.

🔹 Expand your empire – Start with a small grocery store and transform it into a thriving supermarket chain while overcoming market challenges.

Are You Ready for the Challenge?

If you dream of building a retail empire and tackling the challenges of real entrepreneurship, Better Mart is the game for you. Manage your inventory, oversee your staff, optimize customer experience, and turn your store into a true success story.

Take charge and build the ultimate supermarket today! 🚀

name: Better Mart

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64bits
  • Processor: Intel or AMD quad-core, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with DirectX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64bits
  • Processor: Intel or AMD quad-core, 2.5 GHz or +
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with DirectX12
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
